Html:
Hey radioman,

I'm currently facing a tile loading problem when using BingMaps.
Some of the Tiles doesn't get loaded even when 'ServerOnly' is set or zooming in and out.
The same for the Satellite Tiles.

Here the examples:
http://fs1.directupload.net/images/150630/zsnlbqmg.png

http://fs1.directupload.net/images/150630/3iynzqcr.png

Before I had the problem when using GoogleMaps but after getting a newer version of the library GoogleMaps works fine but BingMaps does these strange tile loadings.
Do you have any suggetions?

Thanks in advance!
whats the position? i'll check it

Its position independently...

for example Lat/Lng 52.9418367 / 7.8334236

Well this is weird... I encountered the problem when I was on my laptop in a different network.
At home I tried the Hot Build: Application GMap.NET Build-76d7772bd36e-20150519.zip uploaded May 19 and now both is working.
Any ideas why this was happening?
it's possible network timeout, you can increase it: GMapProvider.TimeoutMs = 10 * 1000; //10s

thanks radioman,

I'll give that a shot!

Hm no, doesn't solve it...
Does the library have issues with proxys?
by default no proxy is used
